description: The trap is generated when a user fails to authentication.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-SSH-MIB::hh3cSSHUserAuthFailure HH3C-SSH-MIB::hh3cSSHAttemptUserName s EXAMPLE HH3C-SSH-MIB::hh3cSSHAttemptIpAddrType i 0 HH3C-SSH-MIB::hh3cSSHAttemptIpAddr s EXAMPLE HH3C-SSH-MIB::hh3cSSHUserAuthFailureReason i 1

description: The user name of the attacker who attempted to log in.
variables.name: HH3C-SSH-MIB::hh3cSSHAttemptUserName

description: The IP address type of the attacker who attempted to log in.
variables.name: HH3C-SSH-MIB::hh3cSSHAttemptIpAddrType

description: The IP address of the attacker who attempted to log in.
variables.name: HH3C-SSH-MIB::hh3cSSHAttemptIpAddr

description: The reason for that a user failed to log in.
variables.name: HH3C-SSH-MIB::hh3cSSHUserAuthFailureReason

description: The trap is generated when a user fails to negotiate SSH

event.Summary: User failed to negotiate SSH protocol version

description: The IP address type of the attacker who attempted to log in.
variables.name: HH3C-SSH-MIB::hh3cSSHAttemptIpAddrType

description: The IP address of the attacker who attempted to log in.
variables.name: HH3C-SSH-MIB::hh3cSSHAttemptIpAddr

description: The trap is generated when a user logs in successfully.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-SSH-MIB::hh3cSSHUserLogin HH3C-SSH-MIB::hh3cSSHSessionUserName s EXAMPLE HH3C-SSH-MIB::hh3cSSHSessionUserIpAddrType i 0 HH3C-SSH-MIB::hh3cSSHSessionUserIpAddr s EXAMPLE

description: The user name of SSH session.
variables.name: HH3C-SSH-MIB::hh3cSSHSessionUserName

description: The user IP address type of SSH session.
variables.name: HH3C-SSH-MIB::hh3cSSHSessionUserIpAddrType

description: The user IP address of SSH session.
variables.name: HH3C-SSH-MIB::hh3cSSHSessionUserIpAddr

description: The trap is generated when a user logs off.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-SSH-MIB::hh3cSSHUserLogoff HH3C-SSH-MIB::hh3cSSHSessionUserName s EXAMPLE HH3C-SSH-MIB::hh3cSSHSessionUserIpAddrType i 0 HH3C-SSH-MIB::hh3cSSHSessionUserIpAddr s EXAMPLE

description: The user name of SSH session.
variables.name: HH3C-SSH-MIB::hh3cSSHSessionUserName

description: The user IP address type of SSH session.
variables.name: HH3C-SSH-MIB::hh3cSSHSessionUserIpAddrType

description: The user IP address of SSH session.
variables.name: HH3C-SSH-MIB::hh3cSSHSessionUserIpAddr
